argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pwscrng.y | |- Y = ( R ^s I ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` R ) = ( Scalar ` R ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_pwsval | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ I e. V ) -> Y = ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) = ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ I e. V ) -> I e. V ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Scalar ` R ) e. _V |
| 7 | 6 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ I e. V ) -> ( Scalar ` R ) e. _V ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fconst6g | |- ( R e. CRing -> ( I X. { R } ) : I --> CRing ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ I e. V ) -> ( I X. { R } ) : I --> CRing ) |
| 10 | 4, 5, 7, 9 | #P_prdscrngd | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ I e. V ) -> ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) e. CRing ) |
| 11 | 3, 10 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ I e. V ) -> Y e. CRing ) |
